title: Adam Back Wants 'Prodigal Son' Roger Ver to Come Home to Bitcoin
description: In his new book, Ver claims Bitcoin was “hijacked” and corrupted—Back says Ver should let it go and return to BTC.

title: OKX removes USDT pairs in Europe as new stablecoin regulations loom
description:
Crypto exchange OKX is reportedly delisting Tether (USDT) pairs in the EU and will only support USDC and Euro-based stablecoin pairs, according to a message sent to a customer on March 18. The move comes days after the EU released draft technical standards related to stablecoins, which are set to come into effect from June. […]

The post OKX removes USDT pairs in Europe as new stablecoin regulations loom appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: $100K to $150K — Traders Target Six-Figure Heights With Long-Dated Bitcoin Call Options
description: Recent data reveals a significant uptick in open interest for bitcoin futures and options across various trading platforms in recent weeks. On Monday, insights from QCP Capital indicated a notable interest in long-term September and December bitcoin calls, aiming for the lofty six-figure price brackets. Confidence Soars With Bets on Bitcoin Exceeding $100K Just last […]
